actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the withholding of income tax from annuity payments.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow annuitants to specify the amount they elect to have withheld from their annuity payments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the withholding of income tax from annuity payments.
